articles.title: $100M for repairing San Diego sidewalks as injuries mount

articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — U-Haul has a New Year's resolution: cut down on hiring people who smoke.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) U-Haul has a New Year's resolution: cut down on hiring people who smoke.
